name: Crazy GUI Screen
description:
Crazy GUI Screen  is an frenetic platformer where in each level, the screen change into a unexpected  behavior.

Made by RetroGamer for My First Game Jam: Summer 2020.

A-D / Right-Left Arrow keys | Horizontal Movement

W-S / Up-Down ArrowKey  / Spacebar / J | Jump 

W-S-A-D / Up-Down-Right-Left ArrowKey / Move in Menu

Enter | Selection

BackSpace | Return

Each of the 16 screen modes can, in turn, be played in the 16 predesigned levels, which would add up to a total of 256 playable levels, which is counted for each mode with a small bar in the level selection menu .
